name: ASAP2 ECU Description File
summary: Standard file format specified by the ASAM MCD-2MC (ASAP2) workgroup; describes the interfaces, measurements, and parameters of an Electronic Control Unit (ECU), an electronics component that is used to control various parts of a motor vehicle; helps in the process of transforming an ECU model design into a physical ECU; also helps in the process of calibrating and testing the ECU.
